column1: Global Carbon Dioxide emissions from fossil fuel consumption and cement production

D.  Gilfillan, G.  Marland, T.  Boden, and R.  Andres. 2019.  Global, Regional, and National Fossil-Fuel CO2 Emissions.  Carbon Dioxide Information Analysis Center at Appalachian State University, Boone North Carolina, https://energy appstate/CDIAC

Global carbon dioxide emissions from 1751 to 2016. Total CO2 emissions including emissions from solid fuel consumption, liquid fuel consumption, gas fuel consumption, cement production, and gas flaring shown in million metric tons of carbon. Per capita CO2 emissions (starting in 1949) in metric tons of carbon.

column2: Total carbon emissions from fossil fuel consumption and cement production (million metric tons of C)
column3: Carbon emissions from solid fuel consumption
column4: Carbon emissions from liquid fuel consumption
column5: Carbon emissions from gas fuel consumption
column8: Per capita carbon emissions (metric tons of carbon; after 1949 only)
